description: This file demonstrates the usage of the GeminiTools Toolkit for video generation within an agent framework. It sets up an agent with specific models and tools, then runs a sample request to generate a video, saving the resulting videos locally.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that orchestrates models and tools to perform tasks such as video generation.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response generated by the agent based on a prompt.

methods.name: run_response
methods.description: Executes the agent to generate a response, potentially including videos.
